Test_ExitProcess.help_text: Test_ExitProcess <exit code> - immediately kill the process.

Test_Loop.help_text: Test_Loop <loop name> - loop back to the specified loop start point unconditionally.

Test_LoopCount.help_text: Test_LoopCount <loop name> <count> - loop back to the specified loop start point the specified # of times.

Test_LoopForNumSeconds.help_text: Test_LoopForNumSeconds <loop name> <time> - loop back to the specified start point for the specified # of seconds.

Test_RandomChance.help_text: Test_RandomChance <percent chance, 0-100> <token1> <token2...> - Roll the dice and maybe run the command following the percentage chance.

Test_StartLoop.help_text: Test_StartLoop <loop name> - Denote the start of a loop. Really just defines a named point you can jump to.

UpdateBinarySizes.help_text: Dumps the binary sizes to use for the game in loadaddress.vpc

_resetgamestats.help_text: Erases current game stats and writes out a blank stats file

addip.help_text: Add an IP address to the ban list.

ai_test_los.help_text: Test AI LOS from the player's POV

ainet_generate_report.help_text: Generate a report to the console.

ainet_generate_report_only.help_text: Generate a report to the console.

animevents_dump.help_text: List all the currently registered anim events.

async_track_all.help_text: Enable all registered asynchronous tracking convars at once

banid.help_text: Add a user ID to the ban list.

banip.help_text: Add an IP address to the ban list.

benchframe.help_text: Takes a snapshot of a particular frame in a time demo.

binddefaults.help_text: Bind all keys to their default values.

bindss.help_text: Bind a key for a particular splitscreen player.

blackbox_dump.help_text: Dump the contents of the blackbox

blackbox_record.help_text: Record an entry into the blackbox

blink.help_text: Blink specified convar value between two values at the specified duration.

box.help_text:
Draw a bbox
	Arguments:  minx miny miny maxx maxy maxz <lifetime = 10.0> <r g b a>

bug_swap.help_text: Automatically swaps the current weapon for the bug bait and back again.

bugvoice_save.help_text: Write buffered voice attachment data to file.

cl_consistencycheck.help_text: Triggers the client to perform a consistency check

cl_print_consistency_list.help_text: Display's the contents and flags of the current consistency list

clearall.help_text: Clear console output from all views.

collect_entity_model_name.help_text: Collect model names of the entities you're pointing at

condump.help_text: dump the text currently in the console to condumpXX.log

connect_hltv.help_text: Connect to a remote HLTV server.

crash.help_text:
Crash the client. Optional parameter -- type of crash:
 0: read from NULL
 1: write to NULL
 2: DmCrashDump() (xbox360 only)
 3: Same but with full heap
 4: force an Assert

crash_error.help_text: Cause the engine to crash by spewing an error (Debug!!)

crash_job.help_text: Cause the engine to crash in a job thread (Debug!!)

crash_thread.help_text: Cause the engine to crash in a brand new non-main thread (Debug!!)

customgamesetup_auto_assign_players.help_text: Automatically assign all curently unassigned player to teams.

customgamesetup_enable_auto_launch.help_text: Enable or disable automatically launching the game when all players are assigned to a team.

customgamesetup_lock_team_selection.help_text: Lock or unlock the team selection, when locked players cannot change teams.

customgamesetup_select_team.help_text: Player selecting a team during custom game setup.

customgamesetup_set_auto_launch_delay.help_text: Set the amount of time in seconds that will be set as the remaining time when all players are assigned to a team.

customgamesetup_set_remaining_time.help_text: Set the number of seconds remaining before the game starts.

customgamesetup_shuffle_players.help_text: Shuffle the team assignments of all players currently assigned to a team.

dbghist_addline.help_text: Add a line to the debug history. Format: <category id> <line>

dbghist_dump.help_text:
Dump the debug history to the console. Format: <category id>
    Categories:
     0: Entity I/O
     1: AI Decisions
     2: Scene Print
     3: Alyx Blind
     4: Log of damage done to player

debugoverlay_toggle.help_text: Toggles visibility of the debug overlay system.

demo_gotomark.help_text: Skips the current demo playback to the marked tick

demo_gototick.help_text: Skips to a tick in demo.

demo_info.help_text: Print information about currently playing demo.

demo_marktick.help_text: Marks the current demo playback tick for later use

dev_simulate_gcdown.help_text: <state> Turn on/off simulated GC communications failure (GC is down in a way that we know it is down)

differences.help_text: Show all convars which are not at their default values (optional restricted to specific flags).

dota_ability_dump_refcounts.help_text: Dumps the modifier refcounts of all hero abilities

dota_bot_debug_minimap_cycle.help_text: Cycles through different minimap debug modes.

dota_bot_disconnect_player.help_text: Disconnects the player owner of all bots

dota_bot_dump_state.help_text: Dumps the entire bot state to the client

dota_bot_give_gold.help_text: Gives all bots the specified amount of gold.

dota_bot_give_item.help_text: Creates an item for all bots.

dota_bot_give_level.help_text: Gives all bots the specified number of levels.

dota_bot_populate.help_text: Populates the remaining slots with bots

dota_bot_potential_debug.help_text: Displays potential locations for this bot.

dota_bot_select_debug_attack.help_text: Displays debugging info on potential attack targets.

dota_bot_set_difficulty.help_text: Sets all bots to a particular difficulty (0 = easy, 1 = medium, 2 = hard, 3 = unfair.

dota_combatlog_send_death.help_text: Send death combat log to a client

dota_combatlog_update.help_text: Send combat log to a client

dota_commander_report.help_text: Prints a snapshot of the commander's state

dota_create_bot_wearing_item.help_text: Creates a bot wearing a given item def index.

dota_create_bot_wearing_set.help_text: Creates a bot wearing a given set of items from a bundle object.

dota_create_fake_clients.help_text: Populates the remaining slots with fake clients

dota_create_item.help_text: Creates an item for the selected unit

dota_dump_hero_history.help_text: Dump items and abilities that a hero has bought/leveled

dota_dump_server_asset_modifiers.help_text: Dump asset modifiers on the server.

dota_hud_wager_spoof.help_text: Spoof a wager for a specific player

dota_modifier_dump.help_text: Dump all modifiers on all entities.

dota_modifier_test.help_text: Creates a test modifier on unit: dota_modifier_test <entityindex> <modifiername> <duration>

dota_player_status.help_text: Gives a status update on all players.

dota_ref_winner_dire.help_text: Causes the dire team to win

dota_ref_winner_radiant.help_text: Causes the radiant team to win

dota_script_function_help.help_text: Get help on registered script API functions and tables.

dota_spawn_creeps.help_text: Force spawn of all lane creeps.

dota_spawn_creeps_mid.help_text: Force spawn of all mid lane creeps.

dota_start_auto_save_test.help_text: Start an auto save game test

dota_state_disconnect.help_text: Transition to disconnect state on a listen server

dota_test_custom_game_save.help_text: Test custom game saving, only available from dota_launch_custom_game

dota_treerespawn.help_text: Respawns all trees on the map.

drawcross.help_text:
Draws a cross at the given location
	Arguments: x y z

drawline.help_text:
Draws line between two 3D Points.
	Green if no collision
	Red is collides with something
	Arguments: x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2

dump_modifier_list.help_text: Dumps all modifiers that exist in the game

dumpparticlelist.help_text: Print out information on existing particle systems

dumpparticleperf.help_text: Write a spreadheeet describing particle performance to particle_profile.csv

dumpsavedir.help_text: List the contents of the save directory in memory

dumpstringtable.help_text: Usage:  dumpstringtable tablename <sv | cl> <verbose>      Print string tables to console, verbose to dump data.

echoln.help_text: Echo the command arguments on the console

ent_absbox.help_text:
Displays the total bounding box for the given entity(s) in green.  Some entites will also display entity specific overlays.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_attachments.help_text:
Displays the attachment points on an entity.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_autoaim.help_text:
Displays the entity's autoaim radius.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_bbox.help_text:
Displays the movement bounding box for the given entity(ies) in orange.  Some entites will also display entity specific overlays.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_call.help_text: ent_call <funcname> <option:entname> calls function on current look target or filtername, checks on ent, then root, then mode, then map scope

ent_cancelpendingentfires.help_text: Cancels all ent_fire created outputs that are currently waiting for their delay to expire.

ent_characterize.help_text: Spew PVS debug info for entity

ent_create.help_text: Creates an entity of the given type where the player is looking.

ent_find.help_text:
Find and list all entities with classnames or targetnames that contain the specified substring.
Format: find_ent <substring>

ent_find_index.help_text:
Display data for entity matching specified index.
Format: find_ent_index <index>

ent_grab.help_text: grabs the object in front of the player. Options: -loose -multiple -toggle

ent_hitbox.help_text:
Displays the hitboxes for the given entity(ies).
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_joints.help_text:
Displays the joint names + axes an entity.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_messages.help_text:
Toggles input/output message display for the selected entity(ies).  The name of the entity will be displayed as well as any messages that it sends or receives.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_orient.help_text:
Orient the specified entity to match the player's angles. By default, only orients target entity's YAW. Use the 'allangles' option to orient on all axis.
	Format: ent_orient <entity name> <optional: allangles>

ent_picker.help_text:
Toggles 'picker' mode.  When picker is on, the bounding box, pivot and debugging text is displayed for whatever entity the player is looking at.
	Arguments:	full - enables all debug information

ent_pivot.help_text:
Displays the pivot for the given entity(ies).
	(y=up=green, z=forward=blue, x=left=red). 
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_remove.help_text:
Removes the given entity(s)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_remove_all.help_text:
Removes all entities of the specified type
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name}

ent_rotate.help_text: Rotates an entity by a specified # of degrees

ent_scale.help_text: Scales entities.	Arguments: <scale factor> {entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_script_dump.help_text:
Dumps the names and values of this entity's script scope to the console
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_select.help_text:
Select or deselects the given entities(s) for later manipulation
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_setname.help_text:
Sets the targetname of the given entity(s)
	Arguments:   	{new entity name} {entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_show_response_criteria.help_text:
Print, to the console, an entity's current criteria set used to select responses.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_skeleton.help_text:
Displays the skeleton for the given entity(ies).
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_teleport.help_text:
Teleport the specified entity to where the player is looking.
	Format: ent_teleport <entity name>

ent_text.help_text:
Displays text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_text256.help_text:
Displays text debugging information about the given entity(ies) [within 256 units of the player] on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_text_clear.help_text:
Hide text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_text_filter.help_text: Set which ent_text filters you want:

ent_text_radius.help_text:
Displays text debugging information about the given entity(ies) [near the player] on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	2 Arguments:   	Radius, {entity_name/class_name/ no argument picks what player is looking at}

ent_text_sticky_add.help_text:
Adds to list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_text_sticky_clear.help_text:
Clears the list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_text_sticky_dump.help_text:
Spews the list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_text_sticky_remove.help_text:
Removes from the list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_vcollide_wireframe.help_text:
Displays the interpolated vcollide wireframe pm am entity.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

ent_viewoffset.help_text:
Displays the eye position for the given entity(ies) in red.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

entity_lump_spew.help_text: Dump the contents of an entity lump

entityreport.help_text: Reports all extant entities. Optional 2nd arg is a substring of a classname that the list will be filtered by.

entitysummary.help_text: Summarizes (by class) all extant entities. Optional 2nd arg is a substring of a classname that the list will be filtered by.

ents.help_text: List server entities, sorted by spawn group

exec_async.help_text: Execute a cfg file over time

execifexists.help_text: Execute a cfg file if file exists

explode.help_text: Kills the player with explosive damage

explodevector.help_text: Kills a player applying an explosive force. Usage: explodevector <player> <x value> <y value> <z value>

fadein.help_text: fadein {time r g b}: Fades the screen in from black or from the specified color over the given number of seconds.

fadeout.help_text: fadeout {time r g b}: Fades the screen to black or to the specified color over the given number of seconds.

find.help_text: Find concommands with the specified string in their name/help text.

fp_trace.help_text: Toggle field path tracing to file

fs_clear_open_duplicate_times.help_text: Clear the list of files that have been opened.

fs_dump_open_duplicate_times.help_text: Set fs_report_long_reads 1 before loading to use this. Prints a list of files that were opened more than once and ~how long was spent reading from them.

gameui_allowescape.help_text: Escape key allowed to hide game UI

gameui_allowescapetoshow.help_text: Escape key allowed to show game UI

gameui_preventescape.help_text: Escape key doesn't hide game UI

gameui_preventescapetoshow.help_text: Escape key doesn't show game UI

givecurrentammo.help_text: Give a supply of ammo for current weapon..

global_set.help_text: global_set <globalname> <state>: Sets the state of the given env_global (0 = OFF, 1 = ON, 2 = DEAD).

grep.help_text: grep line for pattern, print out matching lines only

groups.help_text: Show status of all spawn groups.

host_timescale_dec.help_text: Decrement the timescale by one step

host_timescale_inc.help_text: Increment the timescale by one step

host_writeconfig.help_text: Saves out the user config values.

hurtme.help_text:
Hurts the player.
	Arguments: <health to lose>

ik_toggle_chain.help_text:
Toggles on a chain in the selected entity(ies), by name of the chain.
	Arguments:   	{chain_name} [entity_name | {class_name} | no argument picks what player is looking at]

instant_replay_goto_tick.help_text: Goto a direct timestamp of the replay

instant_replay_live.help_text: If in replay, jumps back to live

instant_replay_skip.help_text: Number of seconds to skip back to instant replay from current position

instant_replay_skip_live.help_text: Number of seconds to skip back to instant replay from live

item_show_whitelistable_definitions.help_text: Lists the item definitions that can be whitelisted in the item_whitelist.txt file in tournament mode.

key_findbinding.help_text: Find key bound to specified command string.

kickid.help_text: Kick a player by userid or uniqueid, with a message.

kickid_hltv.help_text: Kick a player by userid or uniqueid, with a message.

kill.help_text: Kills the player with generic damage

killvector.help_text: Kills a player applying force. Usage: killvector <player> <x value> <y value> <z value>

listRecentNPCSpeech.help_text: Displays a list of the last 5 lines of speech from NPCs.

listip.help_text: List IP addresses on the ban list.

log.help_text: Enables logging to file, console, and udp < on | off >.

log_color.help_text: Set the color of a logging channel.

log_dumpchannels.help_text: Dumps information about all logging channels.

log_flags.help_text: Set the flags on a logging channel.

log_level.help_text: Set the spew level of a logging channel.

log_verbosity.help_text: Set the verbosity of a logging channel.

logaddress_add.help_text: Set address and port for remote host <ip:port>.

logaddress_del.help_text: Remove address and port for remote host <ip:port>.

logaddress_delall.help_text: Remove all udp addresses being logged to

logaddress_list.help_text: List all addresses currently being used by logaddress.

loop_dump.help_text: Print the listeners of the current loop mode

markup_group_ent_bbox.help_text: markup_group_ent_bbox <markup_group name> -> toggle ent_bbox for all members of the named markup group

markup_group_ent_text.help_text: markup_group_ent_text <markup_group name> -> toggle ent_text for all members of the named markup group

markup_group_spew.help_text: Spew all current markup groups and their members

mat_clearshadercache.help_text: Clears the shader cache used for dynamic shader compile.

mat_disable_dynamic_shader_compile.help_text: Reloads all shaders from vcs files until the next time mat_reloadshaders is called

mat_print_dead_materials.help_text: Print loaded materials that have no valid layers due to not supporting any of the modes in gameinfo.gi.

mat_print_error_materials.help_text: Print loaded materials that are using the error shader or material.

mat_print_expensive_materials.help_text: Print materials sorted by cost heuristic

mat_print_material_info.help_text: Print info about a specific material

mat_print_materials.help_text: Print loaded materials. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_print_materials_unused.help_text: Print materials that have never been used

mat_print_shader_info.help_text: Print detailed info about a single shader. Takes a shader name (hero.vfx) as an argument.

mat_print_shaders.help_text: Print loaded shaders. Takes a substring as an argument.

mat_print_textures.help_text: Print loaded textures in alphabetical order. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_print_textures_size.help_text: Print loaded textures in ascending size order. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_reinitmaterials.help_text: Reinitializes all loaded materials, reloading their shaders.

mat_reloadmaterials.help_text: Reloads all materials. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_reloadshaders.help_text: Reloads all shaders. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mem_dump.help_text: Dump memory stats to text file.

movie_fixwave.help_text: Fixup corrupted .wav file if engine crashed during startmovie/endmovie, etc.

mp_disable_autokick.help_text: Prevents a userid from being auto-kicked

nav_add_to_selected_set.help_text: Add current area to the selected set.

nav_add_to_selected_set_by_id.help_text: Add specified area id to the selected set.

nav_analyze.help_text: Re-analyze the current Navigation Mesh and save it to disk.

nav_analyze_scripted.help_text: commandline hook to run a nav_analyze and then quit.

nav_auto_build_area.help_text: Build out high-precision areas around the edit cursor and create them.

nav_avoid.help_text: Toggles the 'avoid this area when possible' flag used by the AI system.

nav_begin_area.help_text: Defines a corner of a new Area or Ladder. To complete the Area or Ladder, drag the opposite corner to the desired location and issue a 'nav_end_area' command.

nav_begin_deselecting.help_text: Start continuously removing from the selected set.

nav_begin_selecting.help_text: Start continuously adding to the selected set.

nav_build_ladder.help_text: Attempts to build a nav ladder on the climbable surface under the cursor.

nav_chop_selected.help_text: Chops all selected areas into their component 1x1 areas

nav_clear_attribute.help_text: Remove given nav attribute from all areas in the selected set.

nav_clear_attributes.help_text: Clear all nav attributes of selected area.

nav_clear_walkable_marks.help_text: Erase any previously placed walkable positions.

nav_connect.help_text: To connect two Areas, mark the first Area, highlight the second Area, then invoke the connect command. Note that this creates a ONE-WAY connection from the first to the second Area. To make a two-way connection, also connect the second area to the first.

nav_corner_lower.help_text: Lower the selected corner of the currently marked Area.

nav_corner_place_on_ground.help_text: Places the selected corner of the currently marked Area on the ground.

nav_corner_raise.help_text: Raise the selected corner of the currently marked Area.

nav_corner_select.help_text: Select a corner of the currently marked Area. Use multiple times to access all four corners.

nav_crouch.help_text: Toggles the 'must crouch in this area' flag used by the AI system.

nav_delete_marked.help_text: Deletes the currently marked Area (if any).

nav_disconnect.help_text: To disconnect two Areas, mark an Area, highlight a second Area, then invoke the disconnect command. This will remove all connections between the two Areas.

nav_end_area.help_text: Defines the second corner of a new Area or Ladder and creates it.

nav_end_deselecting.help_text: Stop continuously removing from the selected set.

nav_end_selecting.help_text: Stop continuously adding to the selected set.

nav_flood_select.help_text: Selects the current Area and all Areas connected to it, recursively. To clear a selection, use this command again.

nav_generate.help_text: Generate a Navigation Mesh for the current map and save it to disk.

nav_generate_incremental.help_text: Generate a Navigation Mesh for the current map and save it to disk.

nav_jump.help_text: Toggles the 'traverse this area by jumping' flag used by the AI system.

nav_load.help_text: Loads the Navigation Mesh for the current map.

nav_load_aaquad.help_text: Loads the Navigation Mesh for the current map.

nav_load_polyclip.help_text: Loads the Navigation Mesh for the current map.

nav_load_recast.help_text: Loads the Navigation Mesh for the current map.

nav_lower_drag_volume_max.help_text: Lower the top of the drag select volume.

nav_lower_drag_volume_min.help_text: Lower the bottom of the drag select volume.

nav_mark.help_text: Marks the Area or Ladder under the cursor for manipulation by subsequent editing commands.

nav_mark_attribute.help_text: Set nav attribute for all areas in the selected set.

nav_mark_walkable.help_text: Mark the current location as a walkable position. These positions are used as seed locations when sampling the map to generate a Navigation Mesh.

nav_merge.help_text: To merge two Areas into one, mark the first Area, highlight the second by pointing your cursor at it, and invoke the merge command.

nav_merge_mesh.help_text: Merges a saved selected set into the current mesh.

nav_no_jump.help_text: Toggles the 'dont jump in this area' flag used by the AI system.

nav_precise.help_text: Toggles the 'dont avoid obstacles' flag used by the AI system.

nav_raise_drag_volume_max.help_text: Raise the top of the drag select volume.

nav_raise_drag_volume_min.help_text: Raise the bottom of the drag select volume.

nav_remove_from_selected_set.help_text: Remove current area from the selected set.

nav_save.help_text: Saves the current Navigation Mesh to disk.

nav_save_selected.help_text: Writes the selected set to disk for merging into another mesh via nav_merge_mesh.

nav_select_blocked_areas.help_text: Adds all blocked areas to the selected set

nav_select_half_space.help_text: Selects any areas that intersect the given half-space.

nav_select_obstructed_areas.help_text: Adds all obstructed areas to the selected set

nav_select_radius.help_text: Adds all areas in a radius to the selection set

nav_select_stairs.help_text: Adds all stairway areas to the selected set

nav_select_with_attribute.help_text: Selects areas with the given attribute.

nav_set_place_mode.help_text: Sets the editor into or out of Place mode. Place mode allows labelling of Area with Place names.

nav_shift.help_text: Shifts the selected areas by the specified amount

nav_simplify_selected.help_text: Chops all selected areas into their component 1x1 areas and re-merges them together into larger areas

nav_splice.help_text: To splice, mark an area, highlight a second area, then invoke the splice command to create a new, connected area between them.

nav_split.help_text: To split an Area into two, align the split line using your cursor and invoke the split command.

nav_split_aa.help_text: To split an area into two, align the split line using your cursor and invoke the split command.

nav_store_selected_set.help_text: Stores the current selected set for later retrieval.

nav_strip.help_text: Strips all Hiding Spots, Approach Points, and Encounter Spots from the current Area.

nav_switch.help_text: Switches to navmesh for the specified spawngroup

nav_test_test_ray_to_mesh.help_text: Test CNavMesh::TestRayToMesh().  Args: nNumrays, flRayLength, flRadialOffset

nav_toggle_deselecting.help_text: Start or stop continuously removing from the selected set.

nav_toggle_in_selected_set.help_text: Remove current area from the selected set.

nav_toggle_place_mode.help_text: Toggle the editor into and out of Place mode. Place mode allows labelling of Area with Place names.

nav_toggle_selected_set.help_text: Toggles all areas into/out of the selected set.

nav_toggle_selecting.help_text: Start or stop continuously adding to the selected set.

nav_unmark.help_text: Clears the marked Area or Ladder.

nav_use_place.help_text: If used without arguments, all available Places will be listed. If a Place argument is given, the current Place is set.

nav_warp_to_mark.help_text: Warps the player to the marked area.

nav_world_center.help_text: Centers the nav mesh in the world

nb_command.help_text: Sends a command string to all bots

nb_debug.help_text: Debug NextBots.  Categories are: BEHAVIOR, LOOK_AT, PATH, ANIMATION, LOCOMOTION, VISION, HEARING, EVENTS, ERRORS.

nb_debug_filter.help_text: Add items to the NextBot debug filter. Items can be entindexes or part of the identifier of one or more bots.

nb_delete_all.help_text: Delete all non-player NextBot entities.  Equivalent to script 'NextBotManager.DeleteAll(...)'

nb_dump_debug_history.help_text: Dumps debug history for the bot under the cursor to the blackbox

nb_force_look_at.help_text: Force selected bot to look at the local player's position

nb_move_to_cursor.help_text: Tell all NextBots to move to the cursor position

nb_select.help_text: Select the bot you are aiming at for further debug operations.

nb_warp_selected_here.help_text: Teleport the selected bot to your cursor position

net_connections_stats.help_text: Print detailed network statistics for each network connection

net_messageinfo.help_text: Display info about a message (by classname or id)

net_stats_json.help_text: Output server networking statistics in json format

noclip.help_text: Toggle. Player becomes non-solid and flies.  Optional argument of 0 or 1 to force enable/disable

notarget.help_text: Toggle. Player becomes hidden to NPCs.

npc_bipass.help_text:
Displays the local movement attempts by the given NPC(s) (triangulation detours).  Failed bypass routes are displayed in red, successful bypasses are shown in green.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at.

npc_combat.help_text:
Displays text debugging information about the squad and enemy of the selected NPC  (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_conditions.help_text:
Displays all the current AI conditions that an NPC has in the overlay text.
	Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_destroy.help_text:
Removes the given NPC(s) from the universe
Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc_class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_enemies.help_text:
Shows memory of NPC.  Draws an X on top of each memory.
	Eluded entities drawn in blue (don't know where it went)
	Unreachable entities drawn in green (can't get to it)
	Current enemy drawn in red
	Current target entity drawn in magenta
	All other entities drawn in pink
	Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_focus.help_text:
Displays red line to NPC's enemy (if has one) and blue line to NPC's target entity (if has one)
	Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_kill.help_text:
Kills the given NPC(s)
Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc_class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_nearest.help_text:
Draw's a while box around the NPC(s) nearest node
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_relationships.help_text:
Displays the relationships between this NPC and all others.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_route.help_text:
Displays the current route of the given NPC as a line on the screen.  Waypoints along the route are drawn as small cyan rectangles.  Line is color coded in the following manner:
	Blue	- path to a node
	Cyan	- detour around an object (triangulation)
	Red	- jump
	Maroon - path to final target position
	Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc_class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_select.help_text:
Select or deselects the given NPC(s) for later manipulation.  Selected NPC's are shown surrounded by a red translucent box
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_steering.help_text:
Displays the steering obstructions of the NPC (used to perform local avoidance)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_task_text.help_text:
Outputs text debugging information to the console about the all the tasks + break conditions of the selected NPC current schedule
	Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_tasks.help_text:
Displays detailed text debugging information about the all the tasks of the selected NPC current schedule (See Overlay Text)
	Arguments:   	{npc_name} / {npc class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

npc_viewcone.help_text:
Displays the viewcone of the NPC (where they are currently looking and what the extents of there vision is)
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

particle_test_start.help_text:
Dispatches the test particle system with the parameters specified in particle_test_file,
 particle_test_attach_mode and particle_test_attach_param on the entity the player is looking at.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

particle_test_stop.help_text:
Stops all particle systems on the selected entities.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

phys_debug_draw.help_text: Set up debug-draw of physics internal state

phys_list.help_text:
List all physics component contents of every entity in the game;
    -allents: include non-physical entities
    -classes: print class names
    -sdk    : Rubikon build
    -world  : current state of the world
    -world -touch: list body pairs (bodies in contact)
    -world -save <name>: save world to a file
    -world -mem: memory dump
    -world -snapshots: Start/Stop dumping snapshots of the world into the current directory
    -world -profiletraces: ProfileRecordedTraces
    -world -agg: current aggregate data registry (loaded resources)

phys_sleep.help_text: Put all physics in all the worlds to sleep

phys_wakeup.help_text: Wake all physics objects in the Main physics up

physics_debug_entity.help_text: Dumps debug info for an entity

physics_highlight_active.help_text:
Turns on the absbox for all active physics objects.
  0 : un-highlight.

physics_report_active.help_text:
Lists all active physics objects
  -more : extra info

playvol.help_text: Play a sound at a specified volume.

pop_var_values.help_text: Restore previously pushed convars and config values

prop_debug.help_text: Toggle prop debug mode. If on, props will show colorcoded bounding boxes. Red means ignore all damage. White means respond physically to damage but never break. Green maps health in the range of 100 down to 1.

prop_dynamic_create.help_text:
Creates a dynamic prop with a specific .vmdl aimed away from where the player is looking.
	Arguments: {.vmdl name}

prop_physics_create.help_text:
Creates a physics prop with a specific .vmdl aimed away from where the player is looking.
	Arguments: {.vmdl name}

r_camerapos.help_text: Prints out the current camera position + orientation to the console

r_cubemap_takesnapshot.help_text: Take a cube map snapshot at the current camera location

r_entpos.help_text: Moves the camera position + orientation to the named entity

r_force_engine_render_frame.help_text: Force a single render of the engine viewport.

r_render_coordination_state.help_text: Prints out the current render coordination state.

r_setpos.help_text: Moves the camera position + orientation to the specified position

r_toggleviewportsize.help_text: Toggles viewport size between small + full window.

r_viewport.help_text: Slams viewport size to a specified value.

ray_bench.help_text: Load the rays and run the benchmark

reload.help_text: Reload the most recent saved game.

removeid.help_text: Remove a user ID from the ban list.

removeip.help_text: Remove an IP address from the ban list.

reset_gameconvars.help_text: Reset game convars to default values

resource_leaks.help_text: resource_leaks <resource_name>: Show resource leaks for the named resource

respawn_entities.help_text: Respawn all the entities in the map.

restart.help_text: Poor man's restart: reload the current map from disk.

rr_forceconcept.help_text:
fire a response concept directly at a given character.
USAGE: rr_forceconcept <target> <concept> "criteria1:value1,criteria2:value2,..."
criteria values are optional.

sc_dumpworld.help_text: Dump a list of the objects in a sceneworld (Usage: sc_dumpworld <world_index>)

sc_dumpworld3d.help_text: Dump the objects in a sceneworld into a 3d geoview buffer (Usage: sc_dumpworld3d <world_index>)

sc_list_extradata_allocations.help_text: Prints out the overall extra data allocation counts

sc_optimizepartitions.help_text: Optimize the partition assignment of objects based on the next frame's render

sc_setclassflags.help_text: Low level command to set the flags byte associated with an object class. sc_SetClassFlags <classname> <value>

sc_setfloatattr.help_text: Set a float attribute which will be visible to all rendering (Usage: sc_setfloatattr <attrname> <value>)

sc_setintattr.help_text: Set an integer attribute which will be visible to all rendering (Usage: sc_setintattr <attrname> <value>)

sc_showclasses.help_text: List the object class names known by scenesystem

scene_flush.help_text: Flush all .vcds from the cache and reload from disk.

scene_playvcd.help_text: Play the given VCD as an instanced scripted scene.

script.help_text: Run the text as a script

script_add_debug_filter.help_text: Add a filter to the game debug overlay

script_add_watch.help_text: Add a watch to the game debug overlay

script_add_watch_pattern.help_text: Add a watch to the game debug overlay

script_attach_debugger.help_text: Connect the vscript VM to the script debugger

script_clear_watches.help_text: Clear all watches from the game debug overlay

script_debug.help_text: Toggle the in-game script debug features

script_dump_all.help_text: Dump the state of the VM to the console

script_find.help_text: Find a key in the VM

script_help2.help_text: Output help for script functions suitable for auto-completion

script_reload_code.help_text: Execute a vscript file, replacing existing functions with the functions in the run script

script_reload_entity_code.help_text: Execute all of this entity's VScripts, replacing existing functions with the functions in the run scripts

script_remove_debug_filter.help_text: Remove a filter from the game debug overlay

script_remove_watch.help_text: Remove a watch from the game debug overlay

script_remove_watch_pattern.help_text: Remove a watch from the game debug overlay

script_resurrect_unreachable.help_text: Use the garbage collector to track down reference cycles

script_trace_disable.help_text: Turn off a particular trace output by file or function name

script_trace_disable_key.help_text: Turn off a particular trace output by table/instance

script_trace_enable.help_text: Turn on a particular trace output by file or function name

script_trace_enable_key.help_text: Turn on a particular trace output by table/instance

server_game_time.help_text: Gives the game time in seconds (server's curtime)

server_gc_status.help_text: Check status of connection to the GC

set_blocked_hero.help_text: set_blocked_hero <short hero entity name> [short hero entity name] ...

setang.help_text: Snap player eyes to specified pitch yaw <roll:optional> (must have sv_cheats).

setang_exact.help_text: Snap player eyes and orientation to specified pitch yaw <roll:optional> (must have sv_cheats).

setinfo.help_text: Adds a new user info value

setpause.help_text: Set the pause state of the server.

setpos.help_text: Move player to specified origin (must have sv_cheats).

setpos_exact.help_text: Move player to an exact specified origin (must have sv_cheats).

setpos_player.help_text: Move specified player to specified origin (must have sv_cheats).

showtriggers_toggle.help_text:
Displays the movement bounding box for the triggers in orange.  Some entites will also display entity specific overlays.
	Arguments:   	{entity_name} / {class_name} / no argument picks what player is looking at

snd_async_flush.help_text: Flush all unlocked async audio data

snd_async_showmem_music.help_text: Show async memory stats for just non-streamed music

snd_compare_soundevents.help_text: Compare the compiled and loaded contents of 2 soundevents.

snd_front_headphone_position.help_text: Specifies the position (in degrees) of the virtual front left/right headphones.

snd_front_stereo_speaker_position.help_text: Specifies the position (in degrees) of the virtual front left/right speakers.

snd_front_surround_speaker_position.help_text: Specifies the position (in degrees) of the virtual front left/right speakers.

snd_getmixer.help_text: Get data related to mix group matching string

snd_headphone_pan_exponent.help_text: Specifies the exponent for the pan xfade from phone to phone if the "exp" pan law is being used.

snd_headphone_pan_radial_weight.help_text: Apply cos(angle) * weight before pan law

snd_list_soundevents_by_stack.help_text: List all available soundevents using specified stack name

snd_rear_headphone_position.help_text: Specifies the position  (in degrees) of the virtual rear left/right headphones.

snd_rear_stereo_speaker_position.help_text: Specifies the position (in degrees) of the virtual rear left/right speakers.

snd_rear_surround_speaker_position.help_text: Specifies the position (in degrees) of the virtual rear left/right speakers.

snd_samplers_play_note.help_text: Play a note from a specified sampler

snd_samplers_stop_note.help_text: Stop a note from a specified sampler

snd_sequence_set_track_bpm.help_text: Sets the tempo of the specified track

snd_sequence_set_track_transpose.help_text: Sets the transposition of the specified track

snd_setmixer.help_text: Set named Mixgroup of current mixer to mix vol, mute, solo.

snd_setmixlayer.help_text: Set named Mixgroup of named mix layer to mix vol, mute, solo.

snd_sos_flush_operators.help_text: Flush and re-parse the sound operator system

snd_sos_get_operator_field_info.help_text: Currently gets info for a single operator field

snd_sos_print_class_sizes.help_text: Prints the sizes of relevant sos classes.

snd_sos_print_groups.help_text: Prints the current state of the groups system

snd_sos_print_operator_stack.help_text: Prints a master list of currently exposed variables

snd_sos_print_operators.help_text: Prints a list of currently available operators

snd_sos_print_stack_exec_list.help_text: Prints the current stack execution list

snd_sos_print_stack_list.help_text: Prints a list of currently available stacks

snd_sos_print_strings.help_text: Prints a list of currently cached strings

snd_sos_print_tool_properties.help_text: Prints the current state of tool properties.

snd_sos_resolve_execute_operator.help_text: Resolve the inputs and execute one specified operator from a specified stack

snd_sos_set_operator_field.help_text: Currently sets a single float operator field

snd_sos_set_operator_field_by_guid.help_text: Currently sets a single float operator field

snd_sos_stop_all_soundevents.help_text: Stops all soundevents currently on the execution list

snd_soundmixer_list_mix_groups.help_text: List all mix groups to dev console.

snd_soundmixer_list_mix_layers.help_text: List all mix layers to dev console.

snd_soundmixer_list_mixers.help_text: List all mixers to dev console.

snd_soundmixer_set_trigger_factor.help_text: Set named mix layer / mix group, trigger amount.

snd_soundmixer_setmixlayer_amount.help_text: Set named mix layer mix amount.

snd_stereo_speaker_pan_exponent.help_text: Specifies the exponent for the pan xfade from speaker to speaker if the "exp" pan law is being used.

snd_stereo_speaker_pan_radial_weight.help_text: Apply cos(angle) * weight before pan law

snd_surround_speaker_pan_exponent.help_text: Specifies the exponent for the pan xfade from speaker to speaker if the "exp" pan law is being used.

snd_surround_speaker_pan_radial_weight.help_text: Apply cos(angle) * weight before pan law

soundscape_flush.help_text: Flushes the server & client side soundscapes

spew_fonts.help_text: Spew information about font manager fonts

stats_print.help_text: Prints out perf statistics to the console, clears perf history

stopdemos.help_text: Stop looping demos (current demo will complete).

surfaceprop.help_text: Reports the surface properties at the cursor

sv_clearhinthistory.help_text: Clear memory of server side hints displayed to the player.

sv_decal_clear_from_entity.help_text: Clears decals from the targetted entity

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_test_download.help_text: <custom game ID> [<expected_timestamp>].  Test code to cache UGC to dedicated server

sv_packstats.help_text: Show entity packing stats, pass 'clear' as argument to reset counts.

sv_printdecalinfo.help_text: (server) Prints info about decals currently in the scene

sv_querycache_stats.help_text: Display status of the query cache (client only)

sv_shutdown.help_text: Sets the server to shutdown when all games have completed

sys_info.help_text: Print system information to the console

test_dispatcheffect.help_text:
Test a clientside dispatch effect.
	Usage: test_dispatcheffect <effect name> <distance away> <flags> <magnitude> <scale>
	Defaults are: <distance 1024> <flags 0> <magnitude 0> <scale 0>

test_entity_blocker.help_text: Test command that drops an entity blocker out in front of the player.

timedemo.help_text: Play a demo and report performance info.

timedemo_vprofrecord.help_text: Play a demo and report performance info.  Also record vprof data for the span of the demo

timedemoquit.help_text: Play a demo, report performance info, and then exit

toggle.help_text: Toggles specified convar value on and off.

tutorial_start_lesson.help_text: Jump to the passed tutorial lesson

tv_clients.help_text: Shows list of connected SourceTV clients.

tv_msg.help_text: Send a screen message to all clients.

tv_relay.help_text: Connect to SourceTV server and relay broadcast.

unpause.help_text: Clear the pause state of the server.

users.help_text: Show user info for players on server.

vehicle_flushscript.help_text: Flush and reload all vehicle scripts

vis_debug_drawcluster.help_text: Add cluster # to visualization, (-1) to clear

vis_debug_dumpvisibleclusters.help_text: Show the list of visible clusters

vis_debug_find_los.help_text: Find or clear the vis LOS to here

vis_debug_lock.help_text: Lock vis LOS origin to current

vis_debug_record_start.help_text: Record a path to debug vis

vis_debug_record_stop.help_text: Record a path to debug vis

vis_debug_tracelos.help_text: Trace rays and check vis from the current camera

vprof_dump_counters.help_text: Dump vprof counters to the console

vprof_generate_report.help_text: Generate a report to the console.

vprof_generate_report_budget.help_text: Generate a report to the console based on budget group.

vprof_generate_report_hierarchy.help_text: Generate a report to the console.

vprof_remote_start.help_text: Request a VProf data stream from the remote server (requires authentication)

vprof_remote_stop.help_text: Stop an existing remote VProf data request

vprof_reset.help_text: Reset the stats in VProf profiler

vprof_reset_peaks.help_text: Reset just the peak time in VProf profiler

vr_swap_logical_hands.help_text: Swaps which hand is considered 'primary' and 'secondary' (ie. dominant/off-hand)

world_dump_loaded_worlds.help_text: Dump all of the worlds that we know about

world_layer_set_visible.help_text: Show or hide the specified world layer

writeid.help_text: Writes a list of permanently-banned user IDs to banned_user.cfg.

writeip.help_text: Save the ban list to banned_ip.cfg.

writekeybindings.help_text: Saves current key bindings to disk.
